trans-unit.target: TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000010_YDA<tab>You almost got us killed that one time, remember?
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000020_PAPALYMO<tab>Now, now, we both know that was your fault.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000030_MINFILIA<tab>Thank the Twelve we're safe.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000040_CID<tab>Mind your horns there, man-bull!
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000050_MERLWYB<tab>Hah! Mayhap when you mind your manners!
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though the Crystal that bound Thancred is no more, I doubt we can say the same of Lahabrea.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000070_ALPHINAUD<tab>And even if we could, we know that he is not alone. Confounded Ascians...
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Their god may be unknown to us, but their zeal is unquestionable.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Suffice it to say, it would be folly to assume that they no longer pose a threat.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nevertheless...
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000110_ALPHINAUD<tab>For now we must savor what peace we have won, however ephemeral.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_000120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Do you see, Grandfather? Our first step towards realizing the dream for which you gave your life.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100130_RAUBAHN<tab>Friends! The dread night of imperial tyranny and Ascian machination is ended.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100140_RAUBAHN<tab>A new day now begins in Eorzea.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100150_MERLWYB<tab>True to their name, the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, along with our champion, have delivered us from darkness.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100160_KANESENNA<tab>Let their shared victory serve to remind us of our shared history.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100170_KANESENNA<tab>And let their bravery in the face of adversity inspire future generations.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100180_RAUBAHN<tab>Doubt not the realm will <var 1A 02 /var>need<var 1A 01 /var> bravery in the days to come.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100190_RAUBAHN<tab>Old rifts threaten to divide us within our walls, while hordes of beastmen claw at our gates.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100200_RAUBAHN<tab>And though the Black Wolf be slain, the rest of the pack remains.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100210_RAUBAHN<tab>Yet no foe need we fear, so long as we stand as one...
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100220_MERLWYB<tab>So long as the Scions stand for peace...
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100230_KANESENNA<tab>So long as our champion stands fast...
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100240_KANESENNA<tab>For there exists no adversity over which we may not jointly prevail.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100250_MERLWYB<tab>No longer can we turn a blind eye to the suffering of our allies.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100260_KANESENNA<tab>No nation stands alone. If one should fall, so shall we all.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100270_KANESENNA<tab>Eorzea is our shared home. For any one of us to know peace, so too must our neighbor.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100280_RAUBAHN<tab>Just as we join in solidarity before you this day...
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100290_RAUBAHN<tab>...So too shall our Grand Companies be joined henceforth, to strive not only for the good of mere nations...
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100300_RAUBAHN<tab>...but for the good of all the realm.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100310_KANESENNA<tab>Change will not come overnight.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100320_KANESENNA<tab>Yet I foresee a day, not so very far from now, when the lines that divide our lands fade...
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100330_KANESENNA<tab>...And all of Eorzea is one.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100340_MERLWYB<tab>It has been but five short years since the Battle of Carteneau. Five years since the advent...
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100350_MERLWYB<tab>...of the Seventh Umbral Era.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100360_MERLWYB<tab>No victory, however sweet, can wash away our bitter sorrows. No triumph can reclaim those we lost.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100370_MERLWYB<tab>Yet do not presume you honor them by dwelling on the past.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100380_MERLWYB<tab>It was not the past they fought for. You would repay their sacrifice by looking to the future.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100390_RAUBAHN<tab>A future united, as the Warriors of Light united in the champion.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100400_MERLWYB<tab>Now is the time for us to rise as one, bearing all of Eorzea on our shoulders!
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100410_KANESENNA<tab>Five years ago, Eorzea bore witness to the end of the Sixth Astral Era.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100420_KANESENNA<tab>Now the Seventh Umbral Era draws to a close. Yet we come together not to glory in its end, but to mark a new beginning.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100430_LEADERS<tab>Let it be writ that on this day... by the light of the Crystal... Eorzea ushered in a NEW era!
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100440_LEADERS<tab>The Seventh Astral Era is come!
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_100450_LEADERS<tab>And thus is ours a realm reborn!
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_500460_MINFILIA<tab>What is it?
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_500470_CLATTERM<tab>Huh!?
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_500480_CLATTERM<tab>What was that!?
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_500490_CLATTERM<tab>Uwaaaaaah!
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_500500_CLATTERM<tab>That roar... It can't be.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_500510_CLATTERM<tab>Did you hear that?
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_500520_CLATTERM<tab>There's no time to spare.
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_500530_CLATTERM<tab>Where is it coming from?
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_500540_GUARD<tab>Dread tidings! Chaos and carnage...
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_500550_GUARD<tab>It is an abomination─! A...primal! A primal has awakened!
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_600560_PASHTAROT<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Bahamut stirs.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_600570_IGEYORLM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>As will the others ere long.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_600580_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>'Tis not a question of whether Eorzea's champion shall yield, but of when.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_600590_LAHABREAANCIENT<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>And with each passing moment we draw closer to the Reckoning.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_600600_FOURTEENASCIANS<tab>(-Ascians-)<var 48 F20223 /var>To the one true god!<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_MANFST600_00525_600610_FOURTEENASCIANS<tab>(-Ascians-)<var 48 F20223 /var>To Zodiark!<var 48 01 /var>
